channel.title: Design on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Design on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: aarrr
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: AARRR framework We use the AARRR framework to measure and optimize every phase of a product by optimizing it through the insane focus on one metric at a time.

item.title: Design Sprint
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is the design sprint? The sprint is a four-day process for answering critical business questions through design, prototyping and testing ideas with customers.

item.title: Lean Canvas
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Lean Canvas Lean Canvas is an adaptation of Business Model Canvas by Alexander Osterwalder which Ash Maurya created in the Lean Startup spirit (Fast, Concise and Effective startup).

item.title: Low-fidelity prototype: UI Design
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Research 1. Understand prospect Understanding stakeholder, company, business model, goals and challenges of the product in order to set mindset, define style, color palette, and typography, iconography, illustration, and photography.

item.title: UX
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: UX Research Framework 1. Gather Data In the first phase, we focus on gathering as much valuable data as humanly possible.

item.title: wireframe
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Wireframe: Workflow Design Created on scraps of paper, a whiteboard, or in a software program, serve to establish relationships between elements in a project such as navigation, imagery, and calls to action.
